results.title: Style-Consistent 3D Indoor Scene Synthesis with Decoupled Objects
results.summary: This paper presents a novel pipeline for controllable 3D indoor scene synthesis that allows for the stylization and decoupling of objects, enhancing the editing process for applications in gaming, film, and augmented/virtual reality. The approach ensures style consistency across multiple objects while allowing for individual customization, resulting in visually impressive and diverse scenes.

results.title: Category Theory for Programmers: The Preface
results.summary: This preface introduces the concept of category theory tailored for programmers, emphasizing its relevance and utility in programming practices. The author expresses a desire to bridge the gap between abstract mathematics and practical programming, aiming to make complex ideas accessible to engineers.

results.title: Introducing Agent-o-rama: build, trace, evaluate, and monitor stateful LLM agents in Java or Clojure
results.summary: Agent-o-rama is an open-sourced library designed for building scalable and stateful LLM agents on the JVM, offering APIs for both Java and Clojure. It aims to provide integrated tooling for evaluating, observing, and deploying LLM-based systems, addressing the fragmentation in existing AI tooling.

results.title: Clojure
results.summary: Clojure is a dynamic, general-purpose programming language that combines the ease of scripting with robust multithreaded programming capabilities. It emphasizes functional programming and offers a rich set of immutable data structures, making it a powerful tool for developers.

results.title: Rationale
results.summary: This page provides a brief overview of Clojure, highlighting its features and the philosophy behind its design. It emphasizes the language's simplicity and coherence, making it a practical choice for developers.

results.title: Getting Started
results.summary: This guide offers resources and instructions for getting Clojure up and running, making it easier for new users to start programming with the language.

results.title: Reference
results.summary: The reference section provides a comprehensive overview of all that Clojure has to offer, serving as a detailed documentation resource for developers.

results.summary: This section contains walkthroughs and guides to help users learn Clojure effectively, catering to both beginners and experienced developers.
